|brand = Hitron |model = CODA-4782 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC22002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AHKM-CODA4782 |icid = 10778A-CODA4582 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;FHCE2712M; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF4G28AB-T; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25U1635F; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646D-BYK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Intel;PEB7085M;(i), PEB7085M, P6U38852, S LLMJ; |cm_down_c = 32 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-120 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, DOCSIS 3.1, MoCA 2.0, VHT160 |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2565T;SiGe, 2565T, 623GM;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85735-11;SKY, 85735, E3R1;4; ,,, eMMC Controller;PHISON;PS8211;PS8211-0, U016210, SIHRH1EE;1; ,,, Full-Spectrum Capture Digital Cable Front-End Receiver;MaxLinear;MxL278;MXL278, K04L7.11, 1645 CC;1; ,,, Upstream Programmable Gain Amplifier;MaxLinear;MxL236;MXL236, P3342.12, 1620CC; ,,, XWAY FLOW24S Gigabit Switches;Intel;PEB7085M;P6U38852, S LLMJ;1; ,,, Single-Chip Power Management IC;Rohm;BD2650MWV;ROHM, BD2650MWV, A1 2002;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = cusadmin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/04/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Hitron 720102 <!--382200720102-01--> |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NKQLSW., K055300; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Hitron 490502 <!--382200490502-VER10--> |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9381;AR9381-AL1A, FP4XU27.K3, 1613, TAIWAN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== * DOCSIS 3.1 2x2 multi-carrier OFDM :5Gbps based on 2x OFDM + 32 QAM * DOCSIS 3.0 32x8 channel bonding
FCC ID also applies to other models which are likely used by different ISPs. :See [https://fccid.io/2AHKM-CODA4782/Letter/Model-Difference-Declaration-letter-3186273 Model Difference Declaration Letter]: *[[Hitron CODA-4782]] *[[Hitron CODA-4682]] *[[Hitron CODA-4582]] - [http://www.hitron-americas.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/CODA-4582-Datasheet.pdf Datasheet], for Rogers *[[Hitron CODA-4580]] {{see also|Hitron CODA-4589|List of DOCSIS Cable Modems}}
==Links of Interest== <!--:{{ProductPage|http://www.hitron-americas.com/product/coda-4589/}}{{•}}[http://www.hitron-americas.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/CODA-4589_datasheet.pdf Datasheet]-->
